title: 求一个Better Farming模组懒人包
author: pvttomegg
txt_content:
只要Better Farming模组，最好是1.23的。谢谢！急求！
Better Farming农业增强

replies.author: strawmaine
replies.txt_content: 资源:115网盘附件下载:1.2.3Better Farming.zip (6.97MB)

replies.author: pvttomegg
replies.txt_content: LS东西不错，但是能不能告诉我声音咋搞出来？

replies.author: strawmaine
replies.txt_content:
pvttomegg 发表于 2012-4-8 18:49 
没事了，谢谢
已经开启设置骨粉单阶段催化效果，不喜欢可在cfg文件里自行更改

replies.author: pvttomegg
replies.txt_content:
